mapper.sql: ID, MAINID, KCLLID, ZT, BZ, XJZT, XJDH, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ
mapper.select: select t1.id kcllid,t.id,t5.hth,t6.username || ' ' ||t6.realname sqr,t3.sqrid,t6.bmdm sqbmid,t3.sqsj,t2.bjh, t2.zwms, t2.ywms, t7.cjjh,t2.sn xh,t2.kwh,t3.dprtcode,t5.gysid,t1.kcid,t3.id xgdjid from b_h_00203 t left join b_h_017 t1 on t1.id = t.kcllid left join b_h_001 t2 on t1.kcid = t2.id left join b_h_002 t3 on t.mainid = t3.id and t3.zt = 3 and t3.djlx=2 left join b_h_00401 t4 on t4.tddhcid = t.id and t4.zt = 1 left join b_h_004 t5 on t4.mainid = t5.id left join t_user t6 on t3.sqrid=t6.id left join d_008 t7 on t2.bjid=t7.id where exists (select id from b_h_001 where id = t1.kcid) and t3.zt = 3 and t.zt = 1

sql.if: and (UPPER(t3.sqdh) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(CASE WHEN t7.zwms IS NULL THEN t2.zwms ELSE t7.zwms END) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(CASE WHEN t7.ywms IS NULL THEN t2.ywms ELSE t7.ywms END) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(t2.sn) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(t6.realname) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(t6.username) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(t2.bjh) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(t2.grn) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

and ( UPPER(B002.SQDH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B017.BJH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B017.ZWMS) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B017.YWMS) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(D008.CJJH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B017.SN) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B002.SQYY) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrqBegin != null and paramsMap.sqrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrqEnd != null and paramsMap.sqrqEnd != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrrealname != null and paramsMap.sqrrealname != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sprrealname != null and paramsMap.sprrealname != ''

sql.if: and (UPPER(D008.BJH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR UPPER(D008.ZWMS) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR UPPER(D008.YWMS) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR UPPER(D008.CJJH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR UPPER(B002.SQDH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrqBegin != null and paramsMap.sqrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrqEnd != null and paramsMap.sqrqEnd != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.yqqxBegin != null and paramsMap.yqqxBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.yqqxEnd != null and paramsMap.yqqxEnd != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sqrname != null and paramsMap.sqrname != ''

mapper.select:
select B00203.ID,B00203.MAINID AS TDDID, B002.ID AS SXID, B002.DPRTCODE, B002.DJLX, B002.SQDH, B002.ZT AS SXZT, B002.SQYY, B002.JJCD, B002.YQQX, B002.SQBMID, B002.SQRID, B002.SQSJ, B002.SPBMID, B002.SPRID, B002.SPSJ, B002.SPYJ,B002.ZDJSRID,B002.ZDJSRQ,B002.ZDJSYY, U.REALNAME,U.USERNAME, B017.SN, D008.ID AS BJID,D008.BJH,D008.ZWMS,D008.YWMS,D008.CJJH, B00203.XJDH from B_H_00203 B00203 left join B_H_002 B002 on B00203.MAINID = B002.ID left join T_USER U on B002.SQRID = U.ID left join B_H_017 B017 on B017.ID = B00203.KCLLID left join D_008 D008 on B017.BJID = D008.ID where B00203.ZT IN (1) AND B002.ZT in (3) AND B002.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} AND B00203.ID not in (select TDDHCID from b_h_00401 t2 left join b_h_004 t3 on t2.MAINID = t3.ID where (t3.ZT in (1,2,10) or t2.DHSL <> 0) and t2.ZT = 1)
order by B002.YQQX
mapper.insert:
insert into B_H_00203
ID,
MAINID,
KCLLID,
ZT,
BZ,
XJZT,
XJDH,
WHDWID,
WHRID,
WHSJ,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{kcllid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xjzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{xjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
mapper.update:
update B_H_00203
KCLLID = #{kcllid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XJZT = #{xjzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XJDH = #{xjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = sysdate,
where MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_00203
MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCLLID = #{kcllid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XJZT = #{xjzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XJDH = #{xjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = sysdate,
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_00203 set MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCLLID = #{kcllid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XJZT = #{xjzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XJDH = #{xjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
